titleStmt.title: The Red-Sea, or, The description of a most horrid, bloody, and never yet paralel'd sea-fight between the English & Dutch with an elegy on that truly valiant and renowned commander, Sir Christopher Minnes, who died in the bed of honour, in defence of his king and countrey / by R.H.
titleStmt.author: Head, Richard, 1637?-1686?

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Head by Wing and Halkett and Laing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
